name: 64 Ōzumō
description: 64 Ōzumō (64大相撲, Rokujūyon Ōzumō, lit. 64 Professional Sumo Wrestling) is a sumo wrestling game for the Nintendo 64, which was released only in Japan in 1997. The gameplay simulates various aspects of a sumo wrestler's life, such as diets and training. GameSpot gave the game a 3.9 out of 10, the graphics were considered "mediocre at best" and the game itself was entirely in Japanese.
